deathrespect.midnightconfig.messageComme: Message shown when a player dies. '%player%' will be replaced with the name of the dead player.
deathrespect.midnightconfig.messageSugge:
Suggested examples:

• F
• too bad
• RIP %player%
• OOF
• skill issue
• L
deathrespect.midnightconfig.randomDelayC: Use a random delay between the minimum and maximum values.
deathrespect.midnightconfig.delayMinComm: Minimum delay in seconds before sending the message.
